short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Zapyrus for highlighted text - Highlight text, right click and select 'Zapyrus search'. Results will open in a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables quick searching on Zapyrus by adding an option to the right-click menu in Chrome. Simply highlight the word or sentence you want to look up and then right click to search Zapyrus. Use it from your CRM, news pages, your online email client, or anywhere else you might find company names, technologies or terms of interest on the web.
